original_text: and they shall cover the face of the land, so that no one can see the land. And they shall eat what is left to you after the hail, and they shall eat every tree of yours that grows in the field,
korean_text: 메뚜기가 지면을 덮어서 사람이 땅을 볼 수 없을 것이라 메뚜기가 네게 남은 그것 곧 우박을 면하고 남은 것을 먹으며 너희를 위하여 들에서 자라나는 모든 나무를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall cover the face of the land,
so that no one can see the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 땅을 볼 수 없게 되리라.

sentences.original_text: And they shall eat what is left to you after the hail,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 우박이 그친 후에 너희에게 남은 것을 먹고,

sentences.original_text: and they shall eat every tree of yours that grows in the field,
sentences.korean_translation: 밭에 자라는 너희의 모든 나무를 먹으리라.
